title: Thermodynamics and Physical Chemistry
description: Thermodynamics concepts related to materials engineering systems and processes: process flowsheets, mass and energy balances, Ellingham diagrams. Physical chemistry concepts related to materials engineering: ideal gases, systems and surroundings, first through third laws of thermodynamics, phase equilibria, chemical reactions. 4 lectures.
prerequisites: Junior standing; CHEM 125, PHYS 133, MATH 143, MATE 210 and MATE 215; Materials Engineering students only
